qc_biggest_issue: Firm name looks like a scraped headline (7 words): "Law Office Of Frank J. Cassisi, P.c."
conversion_note: Fix the revenue calculation error in the hero section - lawyers will immediately notice $247K-$333.5K becoming $237K-$323.5K and question the agency's attention to detail
